attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to improve his website now so that it can receive the millions of hits it is bound to receive when the government makes proposals that are uneasy with the public.  Yes we hear about Beta Tests but lets face the fact that it isn't working as well as it should when it should and as quickly asit should.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
